I need Moriarty, Works, Bauman

Desire common backs, something condition wise that would grade about 2-4.

[quote name="brewing" post=1969326]I need Moriarty, Works, Bauman

Desire common backs, something condition wise that would grade about 2-4.[/QUOTE]

Good luck, Brent - those three are found only with Broadleaf-class backs (Broadleaf, Cycle, Anon Fac3 and Anon Fac 25).
